title: Chicken stifado
ingredients: ['10 small shallots, peeled', '225ml olive oil', '2 teaspoons butter', '1 whole chicken, cut into pieces', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '125ml red wine', '250ml passata', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste', '2 bay leaves', '350ml chicken stock, or more if needed']
